main.name: Alexander Kingsland
main.description: Scroll down for an overview of my profile

bio.statement1: I'm a Toronto based software engineering student graduating April 2021. I'm most intrigued by creating innovative software solutions to tackle challenging real-world problems, with an emphasis in the domains of the
bio.statement2: Outside of my career ambitions and various software projects when I have some time to kill you can always find me doing one of the four things; Playing the guitar, exercising, investing, photography, or working with cars.
bio.statement3: I'm always willing to connect and have a chat about anything you may find interesting about me or want to know more about, so please reach out via my contact information below!

main.contactmessage: Please feel free to get in touch with me to chat.

resume.skillmessage: These are the skills I am most proficient in and have had the most workplace experience with, always looking to improve my current skill set and add more to the list!

education.description2: Recieved Golden Key, awarded to students in the Engineering Faculty with a Cummulative GPA in the top 15th percentile.
education.description3: Relevant Courses: Architecture Design, Algorithms and Complexities, Programming Principles, Statistics, Web Design, Parallel Computing, Databases, Machine Learning.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description1: Developed a Machine Learning Pipeline which leverages the TensorFlow Framework to predict the maximum rate of the Canadarm2 given an initial load configuration.
work.description2: Collaborated with Engineers of various disciplines to perform rigorous testing of the final pipeline yielding an average prediction accuracy within 10% of the test data.
work.description3: Created documentation and courseware modules covering concepts implemented in the pipeline, held weekly meetings with other engineers to walk through the design.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description1: Performed stress tests on home security systems, also verified functionality as according to requirement specifications.
work.description2: Setup firmware patches of individual security system components to be used in engineering field trials.
work.description3: Worked alongside a team of engineers in order to create a document to track bugs found from field testing.

work.title: Engineering Intern
work.description1: Worked with clients daily by visiting buildings to record the dimensions of attic structure, confirm solar panel placement, and sign authorization papers.
work.description2: Optimized the solar panel layout on the client's roof in AutoCAD, the design is approved by a professional engineer and then sent to the builders.
work.description3: Exposure to a start-up environment required taking on tasks involving working with engineers of other disciplines in order to meet company deadlines.

projects.title: HedgeHog
projects.category: An AlgoTrading platform for creating, analyzing, and automating trading strategies (Currently adding functionality and working on a front-end)

projects.title: ProFlightPhotography
projects.category: A start-up founded by myself selling the service of aerial drone photography

projects.title: Personal Website
projects.category: A React template based personal portfolio website

testimonials.text: Alex works well independently and seeks help once he has exhausted his own abilities. I recommend his candidacy without reservation.
testimonials.user: Nader Abu El Samid... Senior MTS, MDA Corporation

testimonials.text: During his time with us, Alex has been very hard working and dedicated to the tasks at hand.
testimonials.user: Derek Smith... Systems Integration Team Lead, Johnson Controls

testimonials.text: There is no doubt I would strongly recommend Alex on both a personal and professional level.
